VIOLATION.Definition: an action that breaks a law, agreement, or principle

INHERENTLY.Definition: in a way that is natural and basic

TRACE.Definition: go back in time to find something

PERSECUTION.Definition: treat someone unfairly over a long period of time, normally because of their religion or race

ABUSERS.Definition: people who treat others in a cruel and unfair way

REIGN.Definition: the period of time that someone was king or queen

SOWED THE SEEDS.Definition: do something that causes something to happen in the future

CODIFIED.Definition: documented in writing, in the law

BINDING.Definition: (of a law or agreement) must be kept

CHERRY-PICKED.Definition: picked only the best or preferred things out of a larger group

AGENDA.Definition: ideas that a party or country things are important

FUNDAMENTALLY.Definition: in a basic but important way

APARTHEID.Definition: the system in South Africa which separated different races

PUT THIS DECLARATION UP ON A PEDESTAL.Definition: say that something (this declaration) is fantastic

DEGRADING.Definition: unpleasant and causing someone to feel like they have no value

OPPRESSOR.Definition: someone who treats someone else unfairly and prevents them from having the same rights as other people

POINT THE FINGER.Definition: assigning blame, saying someone is responsible

CONSTITUTES.Definition: forms, is considered a part of

JAUNT.Definition: a short journey, normally for fun
